text: The Holy Spirit is the greatest reality in the world.
author: Kathryn Kuhlman

text: I am not moved by what I see. I am not moved by what I feel. I am moved only by what I believe.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

text: If your faith says yes, God cannot say no.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with.
author: Billy Graham

text: Your dream is your ticket to your future.
author: Uma Ukpai

text: Success is impacting the world with the investment of your personality.
author: Chris Oyakhilome

text: Money is a servant, not a master.
author: Uebert Angel

text: Grace is not the license to sin but the power to overcome it.
author: Shepherd Bushiri

text: Intimacy with God is the womb that births destiny.
author: Michael Orokpo

text: Faith is the currency of the Kingdom.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: Great faith is the product of great fights. Great testimonies are the results of great tests.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

text: There is no limit to what God can do in your life.
author: Kathryn Kuhlman

text: When you work, you work. But when you pray, God works.
author: Billy Graham

text: You can change your world by changing your words.
author: Chris Oyakhilome

text: The anointing you respect is the anointing you attract.
author: Mike Murdock

text: Your mindset determines your outcome.
author: Uebert Angel

text: The secret of men are in their stories.
author: Michael Orokpo

text: God will never consult your past to determine your future.
author: Mike Murdock

text: Poverty is not an accident; it is a decision.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: Prayer is not overcoming God's reluctance. It is laying hold of His willingness.
author: Martin Luther

text: The Bible is the greatest success book ever written.
author: Uebert Angel

text: Faith is stepping out on nothing and landing on something.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: What you make happen for others, God will make happen for you.
author: Mike Murdock

text: Your life is the harvest of your thoughts.
author: Chris Oyakhilome

text: Do not look at what you are going through, look at where you are going to.
author: Uma Ukpai

text: The presence of God is the atmosphere of miracles.
author: Kathryn Kuhlman

text: God does not call the qualified, He qualifies the called.
author: Billy Graham

text: Every problem is a mountain. Every solution is a seed.
author: Mike Murdock

text: The quality of your life is determined by the quality of your decisions.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: You don't need faith for what is possible. Faith begins where possibility ends.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

text: God's ability is not limited by your inability.
author: Kathryn Kuhlman

text: Your greatest asset is your faith.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: Miracles happen when you give as much energy to your dreams as you do to your fears.
author: Uebert Angel

text: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.
author: Martin Luther

text: Faith looks to the promise, not to the problem.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

text: Don't just spend time; invest it.
author: Myles Munroe

text: The greatest tragedy in life is not death, but a life without a purpose.
author: Myles Munroe

text: You are designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: God is looking for people to use, and if you can get usable, he will wear you out.
author: Rick Warren

text: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

text: Faith does not deny a fact, but it denies the right of that fact to control your destiny.
author: Bill Johnson

text: Favor is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: Your future is not ahead of you, it is trapped within you.
author: Myles Munroe

text: When you discover your assignment, you will discover your enemy.
author: Mike Murdock

text: The more you know God, the more you will know yourself.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: If God can find a person who is willing to pay the price, He will change the world.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

text: Until you have given up yourself to God, you will never be what God wants you to be.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

text: God is not looking for golden vessels, showing off. He is looking for broken vessels to mend.
author: Benson Idahosa

text: Your problem is not the problem; your problem is your attitude about the problem.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: The enemy will always fight you the hardest when you are closest to your breakthrough.
author: Bishop T.D. Jakes

text: Purpose is the reason for the journey.
author: Myles Munroe

text: When purpose is not known, abuse is inevitable.
author: Myles Munroe

text: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
author: Norman Cousins

text: God is more interested in your future than your past.
author: Billy Graham

text: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
author: Billy Graham

text: The safest place in all the world is in the will of God.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

text: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

text: If you look at the world, you'll be distressed. If you look within, you'll be depressed. If you look at God you'll be at rest.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

text: There are no ordinary people. You have never talked to a mere mortal.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted, in spite of your changing moods.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: God disguises His biggest opportunities as problems.
author: Rick Warren

text: We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
author: Rick Warren

text: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.
author: Rick Warren

text: A man without a vision is a man without a future. A man without a future will always return to his past.
author: Myles Munroe

text: Solid character will reflect itself in consistent behavior.
author: Myles Munroe

text: Your potential is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift to God.
author: Myles Munroe

text: The anointing allows you to do the supernatural naturally.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: God will give you the desires of your heart to encourage you to pursue them.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: Don't let your struggle become your identity.
author: T.D. Jakes

text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
author: Mother Teresa

text: It is not how much we do, but how much love we put in the doing.
author: Mother Teresa

text: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

text: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
author: Mother Teresa

text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

text: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
author: Mother Teresa

text: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
author: Mother Teresa

text: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
author: Mother Teresa

text: God loves you just the way you are, but He refuses to leave you that way.
author: Max Lucado

text: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
author: Max Lucado

text: You are the only Bible some people will ever read.
author: Unknown

text: When you pray, God listens. When you listen, God talks. When you believe, God works.
author: Unknown

text: God's timing is perfect. It may not be our timing, but it is always perfect.
author: Unknown

text: Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
author: Unknown

text: God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.
author: Unknown

text: When God pushes you to the edge of difficulty either He will catch you when you fall, or He will teach you how to fly.
author: Unknown

text: God is working on you, for you, and through you.
author: Unknown

text: Sometimes God closes doors because it's time to move forward. He knows you won't move unless your circumstances force you.
author: Unknown

text: Trust God's plan, even when you don't understand it.
author: Unknown

text: If God brings you to it, He will bring you through it.
author: Unknown

text: Your test will become your testimony.
author: Unknown

text: The will of God will never take you where the grace of God will not protect you.
author: Unknown

text: Prayer changes things, but mostly it changes us.
author: Unknown

text: God is always doing 10,000 things in your life, and you may be aware of 3 of them.
author: John Piper

text: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him.
author: John Piper

text: The gospel is not a way to get people to heaven; it is a way to get people to God.
author: John Piper

text: Don't let your happiness depend on something you may lose.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: To love at all is to be vulnerable.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: A revived church is the only hope for a dying world.
author: Andrew Murray

text: Humility is the displacement of self by the enthronement of God.
author: Andrew Murray

text: Prayer is the pulse of life.
author: Andrew Murray

text: God is ready to assume full responsibility for the life wholly yielded to Him.
author: Andrew Murray

text: Faith expects from God what is beyond all expectation.
author: Andrew Murray
